trends: There has been one other sighting in Odense
There were no other sightings in Odense on or around September 13th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsobservation position 55 22 25 n - 10 25 57 e compass direction west. i was on my way home on bicycle after visiting my mum then i saw this beautyful sunset. i found a good position and began taking pictures. i wasen���t satisfied with what i could see on my camera display and made some adjustments in between the shots. i took about 14-15 pictures in total of this sunset. i didn���t see the object or phenomenon while i took the pictures! i was actually wondering about some weird looking clouds but concentrated me primarily on the fast changing sunset scenery. i thought i was lucky to have this beautyful sunset on photography. unfortunately, then i came home, i deleted nearly all of them except of four pictures, which i liked best. they were taken right after each other in a 14 seconds timeframe, with the mode dial function set to "sun", which clearly gave the best results in this particular situation. well, two days after i looked at these four pictures again, enjoyed them because they are beautyful, and then i saw this little sphere rest on a cloud in the horizon. i use photoshop often and made an animation with the four photos, and i can see there, that the object appears to be steady while the clouds passing by it quite fast (see file 3). original 10m pixel pics (3872x2592) taken with a sony a-100 reflex camera you may request for further research: dsc03953.jpg dsc03954.jpg dsc03955.jpg dsc03956.jpg multimedia attachments file 1: wide cut from dsc03955.jpg file 2: object close-ups taken from dsc03955.jpg file 3: gif animation of the object based on cuts from all four photos for more info and pictures: http:\\ufophenomenondenmark.blogspot.com\
Summary: A dark grey sphere rest on a cloud...
